column1: Baby Barnaby's////What really sealed the experience at the end was when one of the wait-staff 'suggested' to my friend and I (as we were chatting and I'm drinking coffee)
column2: that we should get up and make room so other hungry customers could eat.  This was so unexpected and off-putting.  I mean
column3: we did wait forever after all
column4: can't I at least finish my coffee???  What was more irritating about this comment
column5: was that as we politely left
column6: I noticed a large group of 5-6
column8: still sitting and enjoying their brunch.
